pullRequest.title: KOGITO-3618: Jobs management filters
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hello,
Please review this PR which adds filtering capabilities on jobs management  section.
The filter is based on status of the jobs.
JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-3618

nodes.bodyText: please also add OUIAProps interface and component attributes.
can we also check that the chip was deleted? by checking bouth count before and after deletion and also by looking for the chip here?
again, can we check the result here?
can we check that the filter is shown?
can we check that applied filter is shown?
could we make this array rather a function or constant that can be reused in all three places? To prevent any potential issue when changing the default array.
here again a function or constant can be used instead of explicit array (to be sure we're consistent across usages)
